dc.title: Columbia River Treaty 2014-2024 Review
dc.description: crt2014-2024review.gov is the official website and source for information about the multi-year effort to study post 2024 Columbia River Treaty issues. This effort and site is managed through a partnership between the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers and the Bonneville Power Administration.
